Class SerializabilityUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.impl.SerializabilityUtil

public class SerializabilityUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Serialization utility class used by the server-side RPC code.

Method Detail

applyFieldSerializationPolicy

public static java.lang.reflect.Field[] applyFieldSerializationPolicy(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
Returns the fields of a particular class that can be considered for serialization. The returned list will be sorted into a canonical order to ensure consistent answers.

decodeSerializedInstanceReference

public static SerializedInstanceReference decodeSerializedInstanceReference(java.lang.String encodedSerializedInstanceReference)

encodeSerializedInstanceReference

public static java.lang.String encodeSerializedInstanceReference(java.lang.Class<?> instanceType,
                                                                 SerializationPolicy policy)

findActualType

public static java.lang.reflect.Type findActualType(java.lang.reflect.Type unresolved,
                                                    DequeMap<java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,java.lang.reflect.Type> resolvedTypes)
Resolve type variables to concrete types if possible. Otherwise, just return the type variable.

Parameters:
unresolved - The type to resolve
resolvedTypes - A map of generic types to actual types.
Returns:
The actual type, which may be of any subclass of Type.

findExpectedParameterTypes

public static java.lang.reflect.Type[] findExpectedParameterTypes(java.lang.Class<?> instanceClass,
                                                                  java.lang.reflect.Type expectedType,
                                                                  DequeMap<java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,java.lang.reflect.Type> resolvedTypes)
Determine the expected types for any instance type parameters. This method also determines whether or not the instance can be assigned to the expected type. We combine the tasks because they require traversing the same data structures.

Parameters:
instanceClass - The instance for which we want generic parameter types
expectedType - The type we are expecting this instance to be
resolvedTypes - The types that have been resolved to actual values
Returns:
The expected types of the instance class' parameters. If null, the instance class is not assignable to the expected type.

getClassFromType

public static java.lang.Class<?> getClassFromType(java.lang.reflect.Type type,
                                                  DequeMap<java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,java.lang.reflect.Type> resolvedTypes)
Find the Class that a given type refers to.

Parameters:
type - The type of interest
Returns:
The Class that type represents

getSerializationSignature

public static java.lang.String getSerializationSignature(java.lang.Class<?> instanceType,
                                                         SerializationPolicy policy)

getSerializedTypeName

public static java.lang.String getSerializedTypeName(java.lang.Class<?> instanceType)

hasCustomFieldSerializer

public static java.lang.Class<?> hasCustomFieldSerializer(java.lang.Class<?> instanceType)
Returns the Class which can serialize the given instance type, or null if this class has no custom field serializer. Note that arrays never have custom field serializers.

hasServerCustomFieldSerializer

public static java.lang.Class<?> hasServerCustomFieldSerializer(java.lang.Class<?> instanceType)
Returns the server-side Class which can serialize the given instance type, or null if this class has no type-checking custom field serializer. Note that arrays never have custom field serializers.

releaseTypes

public static void releaseTypes(java.lang.reflect.Type methodType,
                                DequeMap<java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,java.lang.reflect.Type> resolvedTypes)
Remove all of the actual types that arose from the the given type. This method should always be called after a corresponding call to resolveTypes.

Parameters:
methodType - The type we wish to assign this instance to
resolvedTypes - The types that have been resolved to actual values

resolveTypes

public static void resolveTypes(java.lang.reflect.Type methodType,
                                DequeMap<java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,java.lang.reflect.Type> resolvedTypes)
Find all the actual types we can from the information in the given type, and put the mapping from TypeVariable objects to actual types into the resolved types map. The method releaseTypes should always be called after a call to this method, unless the resolved types map is about to be discarded.

Parameters:
methodType - The type we wish to assign this instance to
resolvedTypes - The types that have been resolved to actual values
